name: SnarkySecrets
0:
”Alexa, open Snarky Secrets”
”Alexa, ask Snarky Secrets for a secret”
”Alexa, open Snarky Secrets and tell me a secret”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: snarky secrets
des:
Witty snarky secrets from Alexa. Simply say "Alexa, open Snarky Secrets" and get a laugh.

HOW TO USE:

Simply say "Alexa, open Snarky Secrets"

-or-

Simply say "Alexa, ask Snarky Secrets for a secret"

Then after you hear a secret, simply say "tell me another one" to hear another.


SHOW YOUR SUPPORT:

If you enjoy the skill, please give it a great rating so more people will find it and enjoy it as well.

Please provide any feedback to Robert at corpdrone dot com. Robert created the skill and would love to hear from you.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
